bug.author: smilealvin92
bug.summary: how to use resnet101.pt, no where to find it?
bug.description: Describe the bug I want to use the second classifier, and I set the classify to True, however, I can not find the resnet101.pt, and there is no place to download it, can anyone with warm heart to tell me?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/smilealvin92>@smilealvin92</denchmark-link> this is a professional option we offer our clients, to have a dual stage detection and classification system with reduced FPs. The resnet models are trained on specific databases for each client's needs. We do not offer a public model, however you are free to train your own, or hire us to provide you the solution you are seeking.
